pages.text: $(li)The Charcoal is a variant of the $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/coal)Coal$(/l).$(br)$(li)This item can be used as a fuel in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l), $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/smoker)Smoker$(/l), $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/blast_furnace)Blast Furnace$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:utility/environmental/kiln)Kiln$(/l).$(br)$(li)One Charcoal can smell up to 8 items.

$(li)Charcoal can be used to craft $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/fire_charge)Fire Charges$(/l), $(l:patchouli:decoration/others/torchs)Torches$(/l), $(l:patchouli:decoration/decorative_blocks/braziers)Braziers$(/l), $(l:patchouli:utility/quark/charcoal_block)Charcoal Blocks$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:utility/vanill/campfire)Campfires$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l) too.$(br)$(li)Charcoal can be created smelting any kind of Wood Log in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l).
